<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=669) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 220 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Alchemist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=1)

**Prerequisites**
[Alchemist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=665); Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Your advanced alchemy level increases to 3. At 10th level, it increases to 5.

<title level="2">Expert Alchemy leads to...</title>
[Master Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=670)
name: Expert Alchemy
